title: A New art in cooking
creator_credit: Lawry's Food Inc and Jerry Warner
brief_description: Every woman, no matter why her culinary talents, can produce unique and exciting cooking masterpieces in her own kitchen through the artistry of seasoning blends/ Employing works of master painters to introduce this concept, the film demonstrates the ease with which readily available seasoning ingredients can be used to add zest and variety to every meal. In addition, imaginative table settings provide new ideas.
